creek/rivulet
variant of 溪[xi1]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Xikou or Hsikou township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan

sentences.english: The south side of old Hsi-Kou Station. 1968.
sentences.chinese: 南下列车驶离昔日的旧溪口站南端。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 4,700.
sentences.chinese: 凤凰县官庄乡溪口梁继焜小学辖总人口4700人。

sentences.english: Xikou town lies in Xiuning county , as a result , Xikou dialect belongs to Xiuyi area of Hui dialect.
sentences.chinese: 溪口镇隶属休宁县，溪口方言属于徽语的休黟片。

sentences.english: Xikou town lies in Xiuning county , as a result , Xikou dialect belongs to Xiuyi area of Hui dialect.
sentences.chinese: 溪口镇隶属休宁县，溪口方言属于徽语的休黟片。

sentences.english: The mass of ice choked up the mouth of the stream and ponded back the water.
sentences.chinese: 冰块壅堵溪口，截断了溪流。
